channel.title: Posts on The DevOps
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The DevOps

item.title: The story of a nil pointer receiver
item.description: Let’s assume we want to store Gender as an attribute for our users.

item.title: Copying commands from host to VM
item.description: I was following an instruction to deploy an application on a virtualbox VM and I wanted to execute the long commands. By default it’s not possible to copy those command into the VM. VirtualBox has a shared clipboard feature which I tried to get it working but it didn’t happen so I didn’t dig into it and I came up with a funny hack :D

item.title: The Battlefield
item.description: Battlefield is a project that I’ve started in TehPUG. you can read the story behind it and see how I decided to start this project here.

item.title: The TehPUG
item.description: let me introduce TehPUG. TehPUG is the Tehran Python Users Group like any other PUG around the world. People who love python or have heard it recently and want to learn more about it. We have meetups every month. Come and join us if you love python too.

item.title: The DevOps
item.description: I decided to start bloging again. I saw myself in a new situation with new insights. so I came up with “The DevOps” blog idea.
